name: Daily Dew
title: Hydrating Essence Mist
description:
Hit refresh. Concentrated extracts of kiwi and grape quench and nourish, drenching skin in a veil of moisture.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Replenshing lost moisture

Refreshing moisture over or under makeup throughout the day

Prepping the skin for treatment

Minimizing the appearance of pores

Streamlining your routine with an essence and toner in one
how: Use as part of skincare routine in between cleansing and essence step. Can also be used throughout the day over makeup.

name: Freeze Frame
title: Beauty Essence
description:
Stop time in its tracks. Pomegranate extract infuses skin with rich moisture, boosting elasticity and firmness.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Smoother, silkier, more supple skin texture

Plumper, more resilient skin

Increasing firmness

Boosting skin's hydration

Protecting against environmental damage

24/7 anti-aging benefits

All-in-one anti-aging, firming and moisture
how: Use morning and night. Warm product by emulsifying then press essence into the skin. Use a tapping motion for maximum absorption.

name: Wide Awake
title: Brightening Eye Cream
description:
Brighten up. Date Seed extract illuminates and refreshes the area around the eyes.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Minimizing dark circles

Reducing puffiness

Smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
how: Apply cream to the tip of the ring finger. Dot in a 'c' formation to the under eye. Use a tapping motion for maximum absorption.

name: Balancing Act
title: Skin-Smoothing Lotion
description:
Find your center. Soothing magnolia vine extracts restore skin’s oil and water balance, hydrating and smoothing  for luminous skin.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Brightening and smoothing skin

Minimizing the appearance of small lines and wrinkles

Retaining moisture

Minimizing the appearance of pores
how: Place moisturizer into the palm of your hand. Using all four fingers apply in an outward circular motion tapping the moisturizer into skin.

name: Featherweight
title: Daily Moisturizing Cream
description:
This lightweight formula still packs a punch. Avocado protein extract strengthens skin’s own moisture barrier, sealing in hydration to protect and soften skin.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Improving skin's moisture barrier

Enhancing skin's texture and tone

Promoting maximum hydration
how: Pump twice to release cream. Swipe it onto fingers and tap cream into your skin in an outward motion.

name: Rise + Shine
title: Purifying Cleanser
description:
Make a clean break. Apple and peach extracts whisk away impurities without stripping the skin for a fresh, revitalized complexion.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Improving skin's resilience

Removing impurities while preventing dehydration

Nourishing while brightening complexion

Minimizing the appearance of pores

Gently removing makeup and whisking away impurities
how: Rinse face. Squeeze cleanser into the palm of your hand, emulsify, then using a circular motion massage all over face. Rinse off.

name: All Aglow
title: Perfecting Cushion Compact
description:
High performance meets weightless coverage. Hydrating, cooling and brightening with a flawless semi-matte finish and an SPF 47/PA++ protection. Airtight cream puff cushion keeps the formula fresh.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED.
who:
Light to medium coverage

Protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays

Cooling and brightening skin's overall appearance

Skincare and makeup in one

Fast and easy application with flawless finish
how:
Use custom puff to gently tap the cushion, encouraging the foundation to come up. From the outside of the face in, gently press the puff against the skin until the desired amount of coverage is achieved.

HOW TO REFILL THE PRODUCT:
1. Press the bottom center with both thumbs.
2. Push the bottom of the container up.
3. Remove the inner container as it pops up.
4. Press refill cushion into the compact case.

name: Spotlight
title: Brightening Mask
description:
The future looks bright. Bilberry, licorice and lotus extracts diminish dark spots to uncover natural radiance.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Diminishing dark spots

Brightening skin's overall appearance

Revitalizing dull, tired skin

Soothing and restoring hydration

Prepping skin for flawless makeup application

Providing 911 skin renewal
how:
1. First cleanse and tone the face. Unfold mask.
2. Remove one side of mesh. Apply mask to face. Remove second mesh. Smooth to contours of the face.
3. Leave on for 20 minutes.
4. Discard mask and gently tap remaining essence into the skin. Do not wash face.

name: Quench
title: Intense Hydration Mask
description:
Like a cool drink of water for the skin. Hyaluronic acid replenishes moisture, while watermelon and aloe naturally hydrate and refresh.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. NO PARABENS, SULFATES, SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE OR SYNTHETIC COLOR.
who:
Improving uneven skin tone and texture

Restoring a radiant glow

Deeply hydrating

Prepping skin for flawless makeup application

Providing a 911 moisture infusion
how:
1. First cleanse and tone the face. Unfold mask.
2. Remove one side of mesh. Apply mask to face. Remove second mesh. Smooth to contours of the face.
3. Leave on for 20 minutes.
4. Discard mask and gently tap remaining essence into the skin. Do not wash face.
